text: Nocardiopsis xinjiangensis is a halophilic bacterium from the genus of Nocardiopsis which has been isolated from saline soil in the Xinjiang Province in China.UniProt == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Nocardiopsis xinjiangensis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase == Further reading == * * * Category:Actinomycetales Category:Bacteria described in 2003
title: Nocardiopsis xinjiangensis
